# TerrariaModder

> A lightweight modding framework for Terraria 1.4.5 (vanilla, not tModLoader)

TerrariaModder lets you run mods on Terraria 1.4.5 without waiting for tModLoader updates. It uses Harmony for runtime method patching and reflection to avoid XNA compile-time dependencies. Mods are .NET Framework 4.8 DLLs loaded at runtime via TerrariaInjector.

## What This Is

- A modding framework for Terraria 1.4.5 on Windows (Steam version)
- Uses Harmony 2.x for prefix/postfix/transpiler patches on game methods
- Provides a Core framework with lifecycle hooks, config, keybinds, UI widgets, and event system
- Each mod is a separate DLL with a manifest.json descriptor
- In-game mod menu (F6) for configuration and keybind rebinding
- NOT tModLoader - this is a standalone framework for vanilla Terraria 1.4.5

## Available Mods

| Mod | Description |
|-----|-------------|
| SkipIntro | Skips the ReLogic splash screen |
| QuickKeys | Auto-torch, recall hotkey, quick-stack, ruler, extended hotbar |
| AutoBuffs | Automatically applies nearby furniture buffs |
| PetChests | Right-click cosmetic pets to access piggy bank |
| ItemSpawner | In-game item spawner with search (singleplayer) |
| StorageHub | Unified storage with crafting, shimmer decraft, painting chest, relay network |
| AdminPanel | God mode, speed boost, teleport, time control, respawn settings |
| WhipStacking | Restores pre-1.4.5 whip tag stacking behavior |
| SeedLab | Mix and match secret seed features for world generation |
| DebugTools | HTTP debug server, in-game console, virtual input, window management |

## Technical Details

- Target: Terraria 1.4.5 (Steam, Windows)
- Runtime: .NET Framework 4.8
- Patching: Harmony 2.x (prefix, postfix, transpiler)
- No compile-time Terraria/XNA dependency (all reflection-based)
- Source: https://github.com/Inidar1/terraria-modder
- Downloads: https://www.nexusmods.com/profile/Inidar/mods
